com.geolud.atomica.ui.util

Class ImageLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geolud.atomica.ui.util.ImageLoader

  • public class ImageLoader
extends Object
    Responsible for loading all images of the ui. This includes the token images as well as the field and background image. Implemented as singleton.
    Author:
    Georg Ludewig

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Image getBackgroundImage()
      Returns the background image.
      Image getDeleteCursorImage()
      Returns the image for displaying the delete cursor.
      Image getFieldImage()
      Returns the image for displaying a field.
      static ImageLoader getInstance()
      Returns the only instance of the ImageLoader (due to singleton pattern).
      Image getTitleHeaderImage()
      Returns the image for displaying the header in the main menu.
      Image getTokenImage(Token token)
      Returns the image for the given token.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ImageLoader getInstance()
        Returns the only instance of the ImageLoader (due to singleton pattern).
        Returns:
        the only instance

      • getBackgroundImage

        public Image getBackgroundImage()
        Returns the background image. At first call it is loaded into memory.
        Returns:
        the background image

      • getDeleteCursorImage

        public Image getDeleteCursorImage()
        Returns the image for displaying the delete cursor. At first call it is loaded into memory.
        Returns:
        the delete cursor image

      • getFieldImage

        public Image getFieldImage()
        Returns the image for displaying a field. At first call it is loaded from the resources.
        Returns:
        the image for displaying a field

      • getTitleHeaderImage

        public Image getTitleHeaderImage()
        Returns the image for displaying the header in the main menu.
        Returns:
        the image for displaying the header in the main menu

      • getTokenImage

        public Image getTokenImage(Token token)
        Returns the image for the given token.
        Parameters:
        token - the token the image is wanted for
        Returns:
        the image for the given token
